title: Act Three today
body: Today is the day we get the final lore passage in the Bilgewater event. Heres to another great story made by Riot!

replies.body:
Need... more... ~~LORE~~ GANGPLANK! Seriously, I love seeing this new and improved version of him in action, can't wait to see what's in store for him in Act III
 {{champion:41}} "I'll be needing more grog."
Ahem, ermm, about that...
No body, no proof.

If tv has taught me anything it's that a character isn't dead until a body is shown. MF said GP's mistake was not making sure she was dead when she just made the same mistake. Until I see a paragraph go into great detail of GP's mangled and burnt corpse I think he's alive.

Even then, fantasy settings always are able to retcon things if they want to. Vladamir got better at reviving people and now GP's back. Zilean had a panic where he lost sense of when he was and in a frantic use of magic revived GP. Yorick was asked to escort GP's soul to Ekko who was tricked into thinking that GP would help if Ekko used his new experimental Wibbly Wobbly time thingy on him, which ends up reviving him. Bard goes "lol" and revives GP.
Jaredan pls {{item:3070}} {{champion:41}} {{item:3070}}
Just know that this combination of post/comment is so perfect that i will screen it, print it and put it on my home' s walls.

I feel like It's really realistic, the old Gangplank kind of felt like a generic pirate. The new Gangplank feels like an old-school pirate lord that Isn't necessarily someone who would just walk up and kill you just because he can/for fun, but if you give him an reason to do it, he'll happily do so.

I couldn't agree with you more. While I'm going to miss wondering why his Roger's so jolly, this update just adds some much needed depth to not only him, but Bilgewater as a whole. Before, we were just told that GP could become Pirate King if he wanted to, but that wasn't really reflected in what we saw in-game (jolly energetic pirate who liked fighting). BUT NOW, THANK THE MOTHER SERPENT, AND HAIL GANGPLANK! He truly fits the bill, in terms of personality AND appearance. Hell, he'll meticulously scrimshaw a man's leg to make sure no one strays against him. And probably the part I love the most about him is behind this tough facade is still a man who feels pain and such, but is still able to keep up his image for his followers. Gosh, now I'm just gushing, but I really can't wait to see him action again and just keep learning bout him and Bilgewater as a whole. ACT III HURRY UP AND GET HERE ALREADY
{{item:3070}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}
He's dead. :D

I was reading Act III shakin' with giddiness, all like "Wow, GP is so menacing and cool. I'm glad I professed my love for this new character not too long ago!" And then ~~The fire nation attacked~~ I got to part three...

>I professed my love for this new character not too long ago

So you've never played pre-rework Critplank? I feel so sorry for you... Here, have an orange, k?
Oh no, I picked up GP about a year ago. I meant "new character" as in his new lore, personality, background, etc. But I'll accept yer orange and be k.
He will need a loooooot of grog
I could not have anticipated any of this .-. I'm gonna need some grog right about now as well xD
He dead.
I'm pretty excited for this.  I don't know the details, but the rumors I've heard...
spoler me, will te act 3 be amazing?

> [{quoted}](name=Celio Hogane HD,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5syEAodz,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-29T19:35:16.239+0000)
>
> spoler me, will te act 3 be amazing?

<spoilers>
Turns out that Gangplank was Teemo in disguise all along, Miss Fortune publicly announces her retirement and settles down raising exotic breed wharf rats,  and TF and Graves close out the act with a Broadway-style song and dance number with the rest of Bilgewater as leotard-wearing backing dancers.
</spoilers>

(Please note, the above is completely and totally fabricated.  No grain of truth is contained within.  There are no clues to be derived.  I'm ok with fan-art of that dance number, though.)

Thanks for spoiling the musical element!

/sulk
Come on, you can't fool me, i know that the TF / Graves song is real!
I'm extremely disappointed that there is no dance number and that I am not a good enough artist to draw a dance number.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5syEAodz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-29T18:32:07.075+0000)
>
> I'm pretty excited for this.  I don't know the details, but the rumors I've heard...

How many hours away is it though? It should be today right? None of the Rioters above said otherwise even though it's the topic name lol Well, when does the clock actually flip over? lol 2 hours from now, 3, 5, ?

Just want to know when I should pop League open to get the last icon and read the story rather than blindly guessing all day lol Plus I can stay up if need be if it's not an insane number of hours away >.>

> [{quoted}](name=Azler,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5syEAodz,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:07:12.185+0000)
>
> How many hours away is it though? It should be today right? None of the Rioters above said otherwise even though it's the topic name lol Well, when does the clock actually flip over? lol 2 hours from now, 3, 5, ?
> 
> Just want to know when I should pop League open to get the last icon and read the story rather than blindly guessing all day lol Plus I can stay up if need be if it's not an insane number of hours away >.>

I don't know - sorry.  I suspect the peeps running the show are spinning many plates and doing last minute checks to ensure as few things as possible can go wrong.  Adding a _specific_ time to that would just add another thing to the list of things that could go wrong! :)

My suggestion is to 'fly casual' - don't stay up too late if it hasn't gone live yet - all the better to wake up in the morning and check.  It won't go sour overnight, if it comes to that!
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lo55g0Q9hh1qb93d1o1_r1_500.gif
We hope you enjoy it. It's going to be rather dramatic.

Now I'm sitting here wondering if anyone's gonna die.

WHY DO YOU TEASE US SO?!?!?!

Also the fact you're coming in here now makes me think it's literally minutes away.

GAH!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5syEAodz,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-07-29T21:57:56.020+0000)
>

https://33.media.tumblr.com/1f567c256b203b8ff3aaab053fbe47be/tumblr_nqh6tkKL1a1qjqp2qo2_400.gif

when Jaredan WHEN!!!!

Oh god its like riot is a drug dealer, and the lore is my fix.  Riot you dont want to stand between a junkie and his fix so I kindly ask, Lore wHERE?!

Now, Sincarnation, NOW!!!!

;)

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5syEAodz,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2015-07-29T22:31:20.591+0000)
>
> Now, Sincarnation, NOW!!!!

> ;)

yes YESSSSSSSSSSSSS

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P3ALwKeSEYs

Got dragged on an unexpected excursion

Huh, this certainly brings up questions.  I'm assuming this event is canon, so there has to be another act or something.  I could be wrong but just killing off GP without some sort of grim "or is he" is kinda strange.  MF went from charming bounty hunter that I think had been friends or at least competitive rivalry with GP to vindictive revenge seeking woman on a mission.  All is forgiven between TF and Graves? While I find it a believable situation for reconciliation seems like a strange choice, certainly makes for interesting possibilities between the two criminals.

Qualms/Minor Grievances
   - lack of MF development, just really sudden BAM here she is
   - Tahm/Nautilus wHERE?!  The two are probably not big into the city politics, but how does this leave them in relation to bilgewater?  I feel like naut will likely get a lore change just because "wtf is his place" in relation to bilgewater?
   - Nami/Fizz wHERE?!   Same as the above I just care about fizz slightly less, Nami needs more story though xP
   - What was so special about the dagger?


Overall though fantastic work, my craving has been satisfied for now.  Pls Jaredan dont make me wait long for my next fix man, the agony its too much.

Thank You based Rito


edit: #1 I would love for something where GP just walks out of flaming explosion eating an orange like," its alright guys, I ate some oranges and everything was k"
*Tahm Kench prepares*
http://i.imgur.com/6IjYKvr.gif

**Turns out all 3 are descended from Azir and ascend.**

"And now, Graves, TF and Gangplank wander Bilgewater searching the truth of their mysterious past."

{{champion:15}} "Now **you** know how it feels! NOW YOU KNOW!!"
I laughed way too hard at this XD
That was intense. I want to know what happens next, though. Is Bilgewater going to become an even bigger hellhole without guidance? Is Gangplank really dead?
nah. They implied that Miss Fortune takes over, but I think it would be cool if her actions caused Bilgewater to erupt into chaos
Miss Fortune is not in charge of Bilgewater. Gangplank (RIP) falling didn't pass on any specific title. If you want Bilgewater, you have to take it.
So Gangplank is legit dead? He's not pulling a Jack Sparrow on us? Is this gonna be the permement state of Bilgewater?

I don't believe he's permanently dead, even lore-wise.  It's probably a ruse so far.  Champs "die" multiple times every game and they don't go away.  ...and they just did a VU and rework for him.  No, he's not gone.
if you can reply please but is the companion of miss fortune rafen seen in the captain fortune skin splash?

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5syEAodz,comment-id=000d00000000,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:42:19.386+0000)
>
> Miss Fortune is not in charge of Bilgewater. Gangplank (RIP) falling didn't pass on any specific title. If you want Bilgewater, you have to take it.

So it's been confirmed that Graves/TF's newest skins are canon in that they are "way back when" skins.

Is Captain MF canon? Is it her appearance after the Event? Or is it not canon and how she would appear if she DID 100% claim Bilgewater and all of GP's territory as her own?

I'm literally sitting with Miss Fortune's champion page and the Bilgewater page open, just waiting.

SOON.

Yay! Everybody's friends again! 
~~Except that that dagger is totally going to summon the Bearded Lady.~~
Happy endings all around!
~~Except for the massacre that Miss fortune is going to lead against Bildgewater.~~
Onward to adventure, brave criminals!
~~Except that there's going to be a lot of trouble and they're in no condition to defend themselves.~~
YAAAAAAAAYYY!!!
Holy never knew MF could be so ruthless but proud of my main at same time <3

Looks like Miss Fortunes new Lore and Story aren't set for today, no update on her page.

Also... I wonder if this is truly the final chapter. Gangplank's body. Until we see it... can we truly consider him dead?
Miss Fortune's character intro will be updated later today.

Oh. Well foolish impatient me.

Thank you for the heads up.
#IT'S HERE.
